AddressedSymbol - class itec.minicompiler.SymbolTable.AddressedSymbol.
The AddressedSymbol implements a Symbol in the SymbolTable which has also an address in addition to the TypedSymbol-attributes.
AddressedSymbol(String, Type, int) - Constructor for class itec.minicompiler.SymbolTable.AddressedSymbol
Initialize the AddressedSymbol with a name n, a Type t and an address a.
ArrayType - class itec.minicompiler.SymbolTable.ArrayType.
The ArrayType implements an ARRAY-Type in the SymbolTable.

Initialize the ArrayType with a Type b and a length l.
